text:
Kuoni India unveils unchartered landscapes and novel leisure options Published on : Thursday, September 24, 2015
Following the success of Perfect Moment-The Luxury Travel Collection, Kuoni India today unveiled the second edition of Perfect Moments which features unexplored destinations, unchartered landscapes and novel leisure options that are the future of luxury travel. Perfect Moments contains within its folds something for every traveller.
Be it those who prefer the coziness of known destinations, or those who prefer to leave their footprints on uncharted lands, virgin beaches, hidden Islands; Perfect Moments offers these unique experiences. Meticulously curated and designed for the most discerning traveller the book contains a vast treasure of inspiration and information on luxury travel as a niche holiday experience. From the unparalleled excitement of experiencing the world’s most premium boutique hotels to overwhelming indulgence of the finest luxury resorts across the globe, keeping in mind a taste of local flavors cultures and traditions crafted for every travelers continence.
Speaking at the event, Vishal Suri CEO – Tour Operating, Kuoni India said, “It gives me immense pleasure to launch the second edition of Kuoni India’s Perfect Moments-The Luxury Travel Collection. Over the years, our attempt has been to increase our canvas of destinations thereby presenting our customers with a range of ideal holiday options. Be it destinations with legacy of Luxury or Ananea holiday for the eco-friendly travelers, Kuoni has handpicked exclusive locations which cater to every traveler’s expectations of a perfect holiday”. Containing eight themes, the book offers a plethora of vacations in luxury settings that one can customize according to desire and convenience. Elemental, tailored, original and exclusive, the new face of brand Kuoni Perfect Moments translates the word luxury into a legendary experience which allows the Global Traveller to pick their perfect moments.
